FuncDef:
The ip command sets a load balancing mode for IP packets in ECMP.
The undo ip command restores the default load balancing mode for IP packets in ECMP. The ip command sets a load balancing mode for IP packets in ECMP. The undo ip command restores the default load balancing mode for IP packets in ECMP. By default, IP packets are balanced based on src-ip, dst-ip, l4-src-port, and l4-dst-port.
CLIs: ip { src-ip | dst-ip | vlan | l4-src-port | l4-dst-port | protocol | flow-label | src-interface }
